articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Indonesian Parliament Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Indonesian Parliament Delegation
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the Indonesian parliament delegation headed by Speaker Agung Laksono at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.
					 On the occasion, Agung said that during his visit to the DPRK he witnessed successes made by the Korean people under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Noting that the Indonesian government and people extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people's struggle, he said that he would make positive efforts to boost the friendly relations between Indonesia and the DPRK.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Speaker of Indonesian Parliament
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Speaker of Indonesian Parliament
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Agung Laksono, speaker of the Indonesian parliament, on a visit to the DPRK.
					It was conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, by the speaker on Friday.

articles.title: Delegation of Indonesian Parliament Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Indonesian Parliament Leaves
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Indonesian parliament headed by Speaker Agung Laksono went back to Indonesia on Friday.
					 The delegation visited the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung at Mangyongdae during its sojourn in the DPRK.
					
					 It also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea and the Pyongyang Embroidery Institute and went round several rooms for hobby groups of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace and enjoyed an art performance given by members of the art groups of the palace.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks 70th Anniversary of Victory of Battles in Musan Area
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 70th Anniversary of Victory of Battles in Musan Area
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held in the plaza of the Victorious Musan Area Battle Memorial Tower Friday to mark the 70th anniversary of the victory of the battles in the Musan area commanded by President Kim Il Sung.
					 Attending it were Kim Yong Chun, Choe Thae Bok and Choe Yong Rim and leading officials of party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, officials in the field of the preservation of revolutionary relics, heroes, those who had honor of being received by the President, persons of merit, members of the 618 Construction Shock Brigade, officials and other working people in Ryanggang Province.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, delivered a report at the meeting.
					
					 The reporter said that the advance of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) into the homeland and the shining victory of the battles in the Musan area commanded by the President marked historic events of great significance as they further developed the overall Korean revolution centered on the anti-Japanese armed struggle and brought about a fresh surge in the national liberation struggle in colonies.
					
					 The above-said victory encouraged the broad popular masses to turn out as one in the anti-Japanese revolution with the firm faith that the revolution was sure to win one victory after another and the country was sure to be liberated as long as there was the KPRA commanded by the President, the reporter noted, and continued:
					
					 The battles in the Musan area clearly proved the truth and vitality of the idea of attaching importance to arms, the idea that the army of the revolution guarantees the victory of the popular masses' cause of independence and the prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il formulated the Songun politics as the main political mode under socialism by carrying forward and developing the idea of attaching importance to arms, the Songun idea and line set forth by the President who gave origin to Songun, and implemented them in all fields. By doing so, he brought about a dramatic turn in the historic struggle for accomplishing the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful nation and the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the army and people of the DPRK have won one victory after another in the fierce political and military confrontation with the imperialists and brought about a great surge in the revolution and construction, thus coming close to the gate to a thriving nation.
					
					 The reporter called on the servicepersons and the people to hold fast to the Songun idea and line as an ever-victorious treasured sword for the Korean revolution, true to the leadership of Kim Jong Il to accomplish the cause of Kim Il Sung with Songun, and defend the security of the country and its people and provide a firm military guarantee for the building of a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation by channeling sustained great efforts into bolstering up the capability for self-defense.
					
					 He underscored the need to dynamically wage the 150-day campaign by giving full play to the inexhaustible mental power and all potentials under the uplifted torch of a great revolutionary surge kindled by Kim Jong Il and bring about once again great innovations and leap forward in order to glorify this year as a year of a decisive turn in building a thriving nation and more powerfully demonstrate the might of Songun Korea. 
					
					 Pointing out that a stumbling block is lying in the way of national reunification due to the reckless moves of the U.S., Japan and the south Korean conservative authorities to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK, the reporter warned:
					
					 If the U.S. and Japanese reactionaries and south Korean traitors persistently challenge the DPRK despite its repeated warnings and the desire of the Koreans for national reunification, its servicepersons and people will give full play to the might of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and all the potentials built in the crucible of the Songun revolution and thus mete out a stern punishment to the aggressors and surely accomplish the historic cause of national reunification.

articles.title: Seminar Held to Mark 70th Anniversary of Victory of Battles in Musan Area
articles.content:
Seminar Held to Mark 70th Anniversary of Victory of Battles in Musan Area
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- A seminar in the field of social sciences was held on Thursday to mark the 70th anniversary of the victory of the battles in the Musan area commanded by President Kim Il Sung.
					The seminar heard papers explaining and proving the facts that the President brought about a turning point in steadily intensifying the Korean revolution through the operation of advance into the Musan area, anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk contributed to the victory of the battles in the Musan area and General Secretary Kim Jong Il turned the area of Mt. Paektu into a magnificent centre for education in the revolutionary traditions and a paradise for the people and the significance of the victory of the battles in the Musan area.
					
					 Speakers there said that the President staged revolutionary battles in the Musan area of the country after leading the Arduous March to victory in the period when the Korean revolution was facing a grave crisis due to the unprecedented counter-revolutionary offensive by the Japanese imperialists 7 decades ago.
					
					 They elaborated on the personality of Kim Jong Suk as a distinguished military and political activist who displayed matchless bravery and excellent marksmanship and well conducted the political work among the people.
					
					 They stressed that under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the area of Mt. Paektu, a historic land where the Korean revolution was started, underwent a radical change as befitting a centre of education in the revolutionary traditions and the revolutionary spirit and stamina of Mt. Paektu are prevailing in the whole country.

articles.title: Many People Visit Victorious Musan Area Battle Memorial Tower
articles.content:
Many People Visit Victorious Musan Area Battle Memorial Tower
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Many working people from all walks of life and school youth and children in the DPRK are visiting the Victorious Musan Area Battle Memorial Tower on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the victory of the battles in the Musan area.
					 In May Juche 28 (1939) President Kim Il Sung commanded the battles to victory and thus instilled into the Korean people the firm faith that the armed struggle is the only way out for them and arms only guarantee the victory of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The tower with the statue of the President was built in a new and peculiar style in 2002 as required by the era of Songun.
					
					 More than 320,000 officials, working people and school youth and children from institutions, industrial establishments, farms and schools from across the country have visited the tower for the last 7 years since then.

articles.title: DPRK Wins Gold Medal at Artistic Gymnastics World Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Wins Gold Medal at Artistic Gymnastics World Cup
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Jin Hyok of the DPRK clinched a gold medal in the men's parallel bars of the Artistic Gymnastics World Cup.
					 Ri Se Gwang snatched a silver medal in the men's vault.
					
					 The competition, held in Britain on May 15 and 16, brought together more than 110 players from 27 countries including the DPRK, Russia, Germany and Romania.

articles.title: Many Poems and Words of Songs Created
articles.content:
Many Poems and Words of Songs Created
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Poets of the Central Committee of the Writers Union of Korea produced more than 100 poems and words of songs encouraging the army and people by conducting dynamic creative activities in the seething reality.
					 At the construction site of the Huichon Power Station they perfectly created the selection of poems "Echo in Huichon", which represented the army and people working hard to successfully carry into practice General Secretary Kim Jong Il's grandiose plan.
					
					 Among them are poems "Let's Meet in Huichon Again", "150-day Campaign Here" and "Toward Year 2012" that vividly reflected the ideological and moral world of the builders working a new miracle and a new speed of advance with the do-or-die spirit and morale that when the Party is determined we can do anything.
					
					 In coal mines of the Anju area poets gave a helping hand to coal miners in pit faces afire with enthusiasm for increased coal production and recited before them more than 20 poems, including "Let Us Stand in the Van of the Struggle of a Thriving Nation", written in leisure time.
					
					 Also, produced were lots of appealing and militant poems full of lyricism.
					
					 Besides, the poets created tens of words of songs stirring up the advance of the times and the enthusiasm of the masses, among them "Youths Always Live for the Future", "Ongheya for a Thriving Nation", "Soldiers Like to Be Called Comrade-in-Arms" and "Tomorrow Will Come Together with Happiness".

articles.title: Successes in Bio-Diversity Protection
articles.content:
Successes in Bio-Diversity Protection
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Much effort has been made to protect bio-diversity in the DPRK.
					Scientists in the Bio-Diversity and Ecological Technical Research Center of the State Academy of Sciences have registered many successes in the re-survey of fauna and flora in nature sanctuaries and other areas over the country and research into establishing a new method of estimating their diversity.
					
					They confirmed the species of animals and plants and modeled the course of their change through a close survey of the west coast areas, good habitat for water-birds, and other major places and provided a foundation for putting the natural protection work for the improvement of ecological environment on a scientific basis.
					
					They have also collected and analyzed ample data on resources of the fauna and flora and compiled a book on animals including spoonbill, a rare bird, and plants growing on Moran Hill along with their specimens.
					
					A new tissue culture developed by them is being widely applied to cultivating good species of trees and good strains of fruit trees.
					
					As a result, the rooting rate of paulownia and grafted dwarf apple trees is over 95 percent.
					
					Meanwhile, a regular survey of animals is carried on once in five to ten years by scientists and researchers of such units as the Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation, State Academy of Sciences and DPRK Natural Conservation Union, according to a state policy of protecting and propagating animal resources in the country.
					
					The animal survey is carried on in such a manner as to estimate the number of species of animals, their distribution and resources of main species of animals in habitats including the natural reserves and animal sanctuaries designated by the state.
					
					Preparations for building sanctuaries of useful animals are being made in different parts of the country.
					
					On the occasion of the International Day for Bio-Diversity (May 22) scientific and technological presentation and other events are held in the DPRK every year.

articles.title: Natural Toothpaste with Special Remedial Result
articles.content:
Natural Toothpaste with Special Remedial Result
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- A natural toothpaste with high medical properties has been developed in the DPRK, which helps promote health of the people.
					 The toothpaste is made from microelements efficacious for the treatment of stomatitis and some ten kinds of Koryo pharmaceuticals by the special traditional medicine processing method.
					
					 It increases salivation so as to immediately disintegrate and absorb carbohydrate, removes mouth smell and stimulates the digestion, thus keeping the mouth clean and making people feel fresh.
					
					 It removes or prevents from being coated with toothscum and tartar, and suppresses the proliferation of germs to prevent paradentitis, periodontitis and caries.
					
					 In particular, it is potent for protecting the teeth of children firmly.
					
					 The natural toothpaste is applicable to burned and insect-bitten skins, eczema and the prevention of cold and others. 
					
					 It was highly appreciated by Korean and foreign visitors at the recent 12th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair.

articles.title: New Speed of Great Advance Created in DPRK
articles.content:
New Speed of Great Advance Created in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- An unfathomable mental power of all the people has erupted like an active volcano and new standards and records stirring the era are being created in an unbroken chain in all sectors of socialist construction on the crest of the surging tide of the 150-day campaign in the DPRK.
					Having kindled the torch of a new revolutionary upsurge in Kangson, a historic land, on December 24 last year, General Secretary Kim Jong Il embarked on a tireless forced march at the beginning of the year, giving field guidance to many factories and enterprises which are of key importance in resolving the economic problems of the country.
					
					The flame of innovation kindled by him in the course of the field guidance added wings to the Korean people's campaign for creating a new speed of advance. 
					
					The workers of the Chollima Steel Complex have been reporting high results in steel production from the first days of the 150-day campaign. They had hit the national economic quota for the first quarter of the year at 106 percent in the industrial output value and 103 percent in steel by waging an intensive increased production drive from early this year. 
					
					The coal industrial units across the country including the Tokchon, Tukjang and Kaechon area coal complexes created more than 500 preparatory cutting sites and secured millions of tons of reserve coal. On this basis, they lifted the coal output 17.8 percent in April above the same month last year. 
					
					The workers of the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex, an electric power giant, broke the peak record in the number of operating generators and hydro-power stations including the Thaechon, Hochongang, Kanggye Youth, Pujongang, Jangjingang and Sodusu Power Stations recorded unprecedented results in power production by pulling their full weight on the control of water and intake.
					
					The workers of railway sectors such as the Pyongyang, Kaechon and Hamhung railway bureaus are engaged in an increased transport drive to carry freight in time to various realms of the national economy, having topped the April target.
					
					Twenty-odd forestry and pit prop production stations under the Ministry of Forestry honored the yearly timber production quota far ahead of the set time by waging a fierce increased production drive at the timber felling sites from early this year.
					
					Meanwhile, the builders engaged in the reconstruction of Mansudae Street taking on a peculiar style in the centre of Pyongyang are pushing ahead with the construction at the finishing stage, creating the "Pyongyang Speed" of the 21st century.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Roll Back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Roll Back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The government of my country should clarify its will to settle its past, to begin with, and roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK at once, urged Shunichi Narita, a Japanese media man on a visit to the DPRK, when interviewed by KCNA at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Thursday.
					 He continued: The Japanese government is persisting in its moves against the DPRK instead of making an apology and reparation for the crimes committed by Japan in the past. 
					
					 Japan is a criminal state which has committed so many crimes against the Korean people.
					
					 Japan brutally suppressed and massacred Koreans and savagely violated their rights to existence in the past. These were unprecedentedly hideous crimes against humanity.
					
					 Japan is, however, playing every trite trick to evade its legal, moral and state responsibility for the above-said crimes, embellishing them instead of honestly reflecting on them and making an apology and reparation for them.
					
					 A satellite launch is a legitimate right of a sovereign state.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese government is crying out for "sanctions" and "international pressure" upon the DPRK, taking issue with its satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 Japan's reckless campaign against the DPRK finds a vivid manifestation in further intensifying the suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The Japanese authorities are inciting bitterness towards Chongryon in the Japanese society in disregard of the requirements of international law and international practice.
					
					The Japanese authorities are talking about the "improvement of the relations between Japan and the DPRK" in a bid to mislead public opinion, but truth can never be falsified. 
					
					 It is impossible to restore confidence or improve the relations between the two countries as long as Japan covers up the crimes committed by it against the Korean people in the past.

articles.title: U.S. Invariable Ambition for World Domination Flayed
articles.content:
U.S. Invariable Ambition for World Domination Flayed
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The United States made public its military budget for the fiscal 2010 shortly ago.  According to it, the U.S. plans to spend 534 billion U.S. dollars for military purposes in the new fiscal year. 
					 Commenting on this, a news analyst of Rodong Sinmun Friday observes: This is a 4 percent increase over the military budget for the fiscal 2009 shaped by the former Bush administration and larger than the military budgets of the 25 countries with the biggest military spending in the world put together.
					
					 Referring to the policy orientation of the new U.S. administration, the news analyst notes:
					
					 It is the strategic goal and hegemonic ambition of the U.S. to turn the world inhabited by nearly seven billion people into one dominated and controlled by it. 
					
					 To this end, the U.S. is hell-bent on the reckless arms race and aggression and war against other countries.
					
					 The new U.S. administration is keen to move the theatre of its "anti-terrorism war" for aggression fought by the former administration inside the territory of Pakistan and escalate it.
					
					 It is increasing the threat and blackmail against the anti-imperialist and independent countries including the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. groundlessly found fault with the DPRK's successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 under its space development program for peaceful purposes. It pressurized the UNSC into issuing an unreasonable "presidential statement" critical of the satellite launch.
					
					 It is also escalating its pressure upon Iran, taking issue with its peaceful nuclear development project this or that way.
					
					 The new U.S. administration is putting spurs to the moves to build an adventurous missile shield, which sparks a worldwide arms race, and working hard to realize its ambition for world domination through the expansion and reinforcement of the NATO.
					
					 This goes to eloquently prove that no matter how frequently a regime changes in the U.S. its imperialists' ambition for world domination based on the "upperhand of military strength" and their scenario for hegemony remain unchanged.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts Lee Myung Bak Group's Crackdown upon Organizations for Reunification Movement
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts Lee Myung Bak Group's Crackdown upon Organizations for Reunification Movement
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- South Korea is swept by waves of suppression of the organizations for the reunification movement.
					 Recently, the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors took such a tyrannical action as ransacking offices of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) and its regional headquarters and arresting and detaining their leading members. They also issued the arrest warrant of them. Prior to this, the group conducted a search, seizure and arrest operation against those students who presented reunification-related papers to the seminar sponsored by a civic and public organization.
					
					 The organizations including the above-said headquarters, the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and the "National Federation of Peasants Associations" and their members that became targets of suppression are staunch pro-reunification patriotic organizations and patriotic figures as they have worked harder than anyone for the independence of the south Korean society and the country's reunification.
					
					 The whirlwind of wholesale suppression of the pro-reunification patriotic forces launched by the group is nothing but a treacherous move to completely put down the movement for reunification daily mounting in south Korea.
					
					 The Lee group sentenced leading members of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration to heavy penalties after labeling it an "enemy-benefiting organization" in the wake of its suppression of the south Korean Council of Youth Organizations at the outset of the year. The whirlwind of arrest kicked up by the group again this time indicates that its operation is being conducted in a premeditated manner to eliminate the forces supporting the June 15 declaration, the pro-reunification patriotic forces in south Korea. 
					
					 Through this repressive campaign the Lee group seeks to weather its worst ruling crisis and further escalate the confrontation with the north. 
					
					 The group kicked off such frantic repressive campaign after groundlessly labeling the above-said organizations "pro-north leftist forces praising the north's system and receiving instructions from it."
					
					 The Lee group's anti-reunification fascist offensive is a blatant challenge to the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for its implementation, and an act of treachery blocking national reconciliation and unity and throwing a big stumbling block in the way of implementing the cause of national reunification.
					
					 If the group is allowed to go on with such repressive offensive, it will result in stifling all the forces supporting the June 15 joint declaration and the progressive organizations for the reunification movement and the prospect of improving the inter-Korean relations will get gloomier. 
					
					 The anti-reunification fascist elements should be thrown overboard as they do not wish to see reconciliation and unity among the fellow countrymen and independent reunification.

articles.title: Solidarity and Alliance among All Koreans Called for
articles.content:
Solidarity and Alliance among All Koreans Called for
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Travel and contact, dialogue and solidarity and alliance among the pro-reunification movement organizations at home and abroad are important ways of achieving national unity and reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 For all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad to pool their efforts and positively realize the national unity on this basis provides a sure guarantee for successfully accelerating the cause of independent reunification. 
					
					 The Koreans' movement for the country's reunification is accompanied by an acute struggle between the pro-reunification patriotic forces and anti-reunification forces. 
					
					 All the patriotic forces in the north and the south and abroad should unite close and solidarize with one another under the banner of the independent reunification. This provides a master key to meet any challenge of the separatist forces at home and abroad and achieve the country's reunification by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 The anti-reunification forces are becoming evermore undisguised in their moves to block travel and contact, dialogue and solidarity and alliance among the pro-reunification movement organizations in the north and the south and abroad and stamp out the movement for the country's reunification in south Korea.
					
					  In order to bring the prevailing grave situation under control and pave a wide avenue for independent reunification, peace and prosperity, broad pro-reunification patriotic forces in the north and the south and abroad should positively realize the travel and contact, dialogue and solidarity and alliance in the idea of "By our nation itself," braving the south Korean conservative authorities' suppression, and, at the same time, steadily boost the solidarity in the movement for the country's reunification. 
					
					 Only when the people from all walks of life in the north and the south and abroad are firmly united to be a patriotic force, boost solidarity and take positive joint actions, can they display matchless strength and the just cause of independent reunification of the Korean nation is sure to triumph.

articles.title: Return of Cultural Treasures Looted by Japan in Past Urged
articles.content:
Return of Cultural Treasures Looted by Japan in Past Urged
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- A "joint inter-Korean Buddhist mass for urging Japan to return the cultural treasures looted by the Japanese imperialists" was held at the Kwangbop Temple on Mt. Taesong on Friday. 
					 Present there from the north side were officials of the Central Committee of the Buddhist Federation of Korea and the National Believers Association of the federation and from the south side officials of the National Council of the south Korean Buddhist Jogye Order and the Committee for Recovering Books that Record Royal Events Kept in the Room of the King of Korea and those concerning the Movement for Recovering Cultural Treasures. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the mass to be followed by the reading of a joint paper of prayer and adoption of an anti-Japanese joint statement. 
					
					 The statement strongly urged Japan to behave with discretion, clearly understanding the grudge of the Korean people toward Japan and their will, and immediately stop the reckless moves to grab Tok Islet and launch militarist reinvasion and unconditionally return cultural treasures of the Korean nation.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Repressive Moves Censured Worldwide
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Repressive Moves Censured Worldwide
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Peace-loving forces of the world are bitterly denouncing the south Korean puppet authorities' violent suppression of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon).
					 The secretary general of Global Network, an international peace movement organization, on May 15 handed to the south Korean puppet consulate in New York, the United States, an international solidarity statement jointly signed by 741 peace-loving organizations and personages of 17 countries including India, Germany and New Zealand.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the headquarters has legitimately struggled for the peace and reunification of the nation so far, the statement expressed support with its efforts.
					
					 We cannot repress our indignation at the arrest and detention of pro-reunification activists on the charge of violation of the notorious "National Security Law," the statement said, urging the south Korean authorities to release all the arrested pro-reunification activists and make an open apology to them and their families and the whole Korean nation.
					
					 The secretary general also conveyed to the puppet consulate his own letter as well as the statement.
					
					 Charging that the south Korean authorities are turning to the repression of the people struggling for democratic rights, the letter declared that the organization would continue expanding its activity to build up public opinion for revealing the unjustness of suppression to the whole world.
					
					 The U.S. is working hard to sustain the division of the Korean Peninsula in a bid to justify its moves for aggravating the military tension in the Asia-Pacific region, the letter added.
					
					 It is deplorable to see the south Korean authorities getting involved in such dangerous U.S. strategy, it said.
					
					 Meanwhile, the International Action Centre, the Europe for Peace, the World March for Peace and Nonviolence and the American Legion for Peace extended encouragement and solidarity to the south Korean people in the struggle to protest against the crackdown on the headquarters.

articles.title: S. Korean Party Vows to Judge Lee Myung Bak Regime
articles.content:
S. Korean Party Vows to Judge Lee Myung Bak Regime
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- The Democratic Labor Party of south Korea said in a statement released on May 18 on the occasion of the 29th anniversary of the May 18 Kwangju Popular Uprising that it would wage a more dynamic struggle to judge the Lee Myung Bak dictatorial regime.
					 The statement noted that the fascist dictatorship reigns in this land though 29 years have passed since the Kwangju popular resistance.
					
					 The Lee regime seeks to pull down the former South Jolla Provincial Office where the resistance raged, the statement noted, adding that this is a fascist action to benumb the fighting spirit displayed by the Kwangju uprisers who rose up in resistance against the military dictatorial regime at the cost of their lives and stamp out democracy.
					
					 Under the Lee regime hell-bent on fascist dictatorship the democratic rights of the people are wantonly violated and a mere call for "democracy" has become a target of suppression, the statement deplored.

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Mexico
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Mexico
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- A Mexican national preparatory committee to commemorate the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated on May 15.
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at its inaugural ceremony.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold under the detailed action program colorful political and cultural events widely introducing the brilliant revolutionary life and immortal exploits of the President and the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il and supporting the just cause of the Korean people in the period till 2012.

articles.title: DPRK Commodity Exhibition Held in Guinea
articles.content:
DPRK Commodity Exhibition Held in Guinea
 Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- A DPRK commodity exhibition took place at the People's Palace of Guinea from April 23 to May 6.
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were handicrafts associated with the Korean people's wisdom and talent, Insam goods and Koryo medicines.
					
					 Present at its opening ceremony were figures of political and social circles, members of Juche idea study organizations and organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and popular masses of Guinea, and the ambassador and members of the DPRK embassy in Conakry.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Riyad Chaloub, general secretary of the Ministry of Information and Culture of Guinea, said that they are very happy to have the exhibition symbolic of the friendship and cooperation between the two countries. And he extended warm greetings to the fraternal Korean people dignifiedly exercising the sovereignty of the country under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il while rejecting the foreign forces' pressure and interference.
					
					 The permanent secretary of the National Council for Democracy and Development of Guinea said that the exhibition clearly shows the will of the DPRK government to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised
Pyongyang, May 22 (KCNA) -- Kembo Campbell Dugishmohadi, head of the Zimbabwean government delegation who visited the DPRK, praised President Kim Il Sung as the greatest man in the world.
					 During his stay in the DPRK, he keenly felt the greatness of the President, he said, and went on:
					
					 Born in a house with low straw-thatched roof in Mangyongdae, the President acquired personality of a great man and an indomitable fighter while receiving the revolutionary education from his parents in his childhood.
					
					 He is the savior of national resurrection and a legendary hero as he liberated the country by leading the arduous anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to victory and turned the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 The Korean people with the history of 5,000 years could demonstrate their dignity as the great people as they had the President as founder of the country.
					
					 His revolutionary history is the brilliant history that propelled the cause of global independence.
					
					 The President, possessed of far-sighted wisdom, made great contributions to the human cause of independence by founding the immortal Juche idea.
					
					 Mankind looks up to socialist Korea where the Juche idea has been successfully applied as a beacon of hope.
					
					 The Korean people and many foreigners are ceaselessly visiting the Kumsusan Memorial Palace where the President lies in state and his native home in Mangyongdae. This clearly shows how deep all people's reverence for him is. The exploits performed by him for the times and humankind will shine forever.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con el presidente del parlamento indonesio
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con el presidente del parlamento indonesio
Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio en el clima amistoso con la delegacion de la Asamblea Nacional de la Republica de Indonesia encabezada por su presidente Agung Laksono en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae.
					  En la ocasion el jefe de la delegacion dijo que durante su visita a Corea, ha sido testigo de los exitos logrados por el pueblo coreano bajo la sabia direccion de Su Excelencia el Mariscal Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Prosiguio que el gobierno y el pueblo de la Republica de Indonesia envian irrestricto apoyo y solidaridad a la lucha del pueblo coreano y subrayo que se esforzaria ingentemente por fortalecer las relaciones de amistad entre ambos paises.

articles.title: Acto central por 70o aniversario de victoria en batalla de zona de Musan
articles.content:
Acto central por 70o aniversario de victoria en batalla de zona de Musan
Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar este viernes en la explanada frente al Obelisco a la Victoria en la Batalla de la Zona de Musan el acto central por el 70o aniversario de la victoria en esta batalla organizada y comandada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					  Estuvieron presentes en el conclave Kim Yong Chun, Choe Thae Bok, Choe Yong Rim y otros cuadros directivos de las instituciones del partido y las fuerzas armadas, organizaciones de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, funcionarios de la rama de conservacion de objetos historicos de la revolucion, heroes, personas recibidas por el Presidente, hombres ameritados, miembros de la Brigada de Construccion 18 de Junio, funcionarios y trabajadores de la provincia de Ryanggang.
					
					  El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Thae Bok, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					  El avance al interior del pais del Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea y la fulminante victoria en la batalla de la zona de Musan, organizada y dirigida por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, constituyeron un evento historico que tuvo capital importancia para desarrollar notablemente la revolucion coreana en su conjunto, centrada en la lucha armada antijaponesa, y para estimular al nuevo ascenso la lucha por la liberacion de la nacion colonizada, comenzo el orador y continuo:
					
					  Esa victoria hizo a las amplias masas populares sumarse unanimemente a la revolucion antijaponesa firmemente convencidos de que contando con el ERPC guiado por el Presidente, la revolucion avanzara siempre victoriosa y sera alcanzada sin falta la liberacion de la patria.
					
					  Ademas, comprobo la veracidad y la vitalidad de la idea de dar importancia al fusil consistente en que se asientan sobre las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias la victoria de la causa de independencia de las masas populares y la prosperidad del pais y la nacion.
					
					Al dar continuidad y desarrollar la idea mencionada, la ideologia y la linea del Songun (priorizacion militar) del Presidente Kim Il Sung, precursor del Songun, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il formulo la politica del mismo nombre como principal modo politico del socialismo y la materializo generalmente.
					
					De esta manera, alcanzo grandes cambios en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera y en la historica lucha por coronar la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					  Gracias a la sabia guia del Dirigente, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea lograron victorias sucesivas en la enconada confrontacion politica y militar con el imperialismo y llegaron por fin a la entrada de la gran potencia prospera registrando un gran auge en la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					  En fiel acato a la orientacion del Dirigente que se propone llevar a feliz termino con el Songun la causa del Presidente, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y el pueblo coreano deben tomar firmemente como garantia de victoria de nuestra revolucion la idea y la linea del Songun y seguir realizando ingentes esfuerzos por incrementar la capacidad de autodefensa nacional para salvaguardar la seguridad de la patria y el pueblo y garantizar firmemente en lo militar la construccion de una gran potencia prospera socialista.
					
					 Hay que registrar una vez mas grandes innovaciones y grandes saltos al librar dinamicamente la batalla de 150 dias levantando en alto la antorcha del nuevo y gran auge revolucionario encendida por el Dirigente y empleando la indoblegable potencia espiritual y toda la potencialidad.
					
					 Asi debemos hacer del presente el ano de cambios decisivos para la construccion de una gran potencia prospera y poner de pleno manifiesto la potencia de Corea del Songun.
					
					 Hoy dia, la causa de reunificacion de la patria tropieza con graves dificultades debido a las imprudentes maniobras conflictivas con la RPDC de EE.UU., Japon y las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas.
					
					  Si los reaccionarios norteamericanos y japoneses y los vendepatrias surcoreanos optan finalmente por desafiar rehusando nuestra repetida advertencia y la aspiracion nacional a la reunificacion de la patria, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea castigaran rotundamente a los agresores explotando toda la fuerza y toda la potencialidad del poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu, que fueron consolidadas en el fragor del Songun, y cumpliran sin falta la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Simposio por 70o aniversario de la victoria en batalla de zona de Musan
articles.content:
Simposio por 70o aniversario de la victoria en batalla de zona de Musan
Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 21 el simposio del sector de ciencias sociales en conmemoracion del 70o aniversario de la victoria en la Batalla de la Zona de Musan, organizada y comandada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					 Las tesis publicadas en la ocasion explican y argumentan que el Presidente Kim Il Sung dio la coyuntura trascendental para conducir la revolucion coreana al ascenso continuo a traves de la operacion de avance a la zona de Musan y que la heroina de la lucha antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk contribuyo mucho a la victoria en la batalla de esta zona.
					
					 Ademas, testimonian que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il convirtio la zona del monte Paektu en un gran centro de educacion en las tradiciones revolucionarias y en un paraiso del pueblo y dan a conocer el significado del triunfo en la batalla mencionada.
					
					  Los seminaristas dijeron que hace ahora 70 anos, el Presidente Kim Il Sung dirigio a la victoria la Marcha penosa cuando la revolucion coreana atravesaba duras pruebas debido a la ofensiva contrarrevolucionaria de los imperialistas japoneses sin precedente y seguidamente, libro la batalla revolucionaria en el territorio patrio de Musan.
					
					  Hablaron de las cualidades de extraordinaria activista militar y politica de Kim Jong Suk quien mostro su incomparable coraje y arte de tiro y desplego con habilidad la labor politica sobre las masas.
					
					  Gracias a la sabia guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la zona del monte Paektu, tierra historica en que se dio inicio a la revolucion coreana, se trasformo en el centro de educacion en las tradiciones revolucionarias y reinan en todo el pais el espiritu e impetu revolucionarios del Paektu, apuntaron.

articles.title: Budistas coreanos demandan a Japon la devolucion de bienes culturales
articles.content:
Budistas coreanos demandan a Japon la devolucion de bienes culturales
Pyongyang, 22 de mayo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar este viernes en el Templo Kwangbop del Monte Taesong la "Misa conjunta de los budistas del Norte y el Sur para urgir la devolucion de las riquezas culturales saqueadas por el imperialismo japones".
					  En la ocasion participaron por la parte nortena los miembros del Comite Central de la Federacion de Budistas de Corea y la Asociacion Nacional de Religiosos adscrita a la primera entidad y por la surena, los oficiales del Consejo Nacional de la Orden Budista Jogye del Sur de Corea y el Comite para el Rescate de Libros y Registros de Eventos Reales Conservados en la Habitacion del Rey de Corea y los interesados del Movimiento para el Rescate de Tesoros Culturales.
					
					  Despues de discursos, se dio lectura al texto de oracion conjunta y fue aprobada la declaracion conjunta antijaponesa.
					
					  Este documento exige fuertemente a Japon que actue con prudencia al ver bien el rencor que guarda la nacion coreana de ese pais isleno, pare inmediatamente las imprudentes maniobras para arrebatar la isla Tok y retomar el camino de agresion y devuelva incondicionalmente los patrimonios culturales arrebatados a aquella.
